Title: Relates to requirements for a course of instruction relating to the Irish potato famine
Summary: Relates to a course of instruction relating to the potato famine which resulted in mass starvation in Ireland from 1845-1850.
LawCode: Amd ยง801, add ยง801-b, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requirements for a course of instruction relating to the potato famine in Ireland
